Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers I
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers II
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers III
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers IV
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers V
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS Chemistry Products AMPH Reagent, Calibrators, and Controls for amphetamine and drug of abuse testing in human urine using automated immunoassay on VITROS 5,1 FS Chemistry System.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use on VITROS 5,1 FS Chemistry Systems for qualitative or semi-quantitative determination of amphetamines in human urine, aiding in diagnosis and treatment of amphetamines use or overdose; controls and calibrators support calibration and monitoring of system performance.
